info.title: Translation Management Service API
info.description: API Documentation for Translation Management Service

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns an authentication token
Authenticate user and return access token

get.summary: Export translations for a specific language
get.description: Returns translations for a specific language in a flat key-value format
Returns translations for a specific language in a nested object structure
Returns translations for multiple languages in a flat format
Returns a list of all languages in the system

post.description: Creates a new language in the system

get.description: Returns details of a specific language

delete.description: Deletes a language from the system

get.description: Returns a list of all tags with their translation counts

post.description: Creates a new tag in the system

message.example: The name has already been taken.

get.description: Returns details of a specific tag including its translations

delete.description: Deletes a tag from the system

get.description: Returns a paginated list of translations with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new translation with optional tags

get.description: Returns details of a specific translation including language and tags

put.description: Updates an existing translation's value and/or tags

delete.description: Deletes a translation and its tag associations

get.description: Search translations by key, value with optional language filter

tags.name: Export
tags.description: Export endpoints for retrieving translations in different formats
